nodes.text: A Bith Saved Is A Bith Learned
A Bith Saved Is A Bith Earned is an adventure in Galaxy Guide 7: Mos Eisley.

A Sleeft Docking Bay Maintenance freighter was checked out by a Bith named Angor Farn. He accidentally got the wrong ship: the cargo is a load of high-quality droid parts, stolen from of Armanda Durkin's warehouses by Sleeft.
